website_summaries.verdict: Not the most durable system, but worth a look for consumers who only need 2 stations with decent range.
pros: An affordable 2-station system that offers 1/2-mile range and 10 channels
Wireless, so they are easy to set up and use
Sound quality is decent considering the low price
cons: Power cord fits somewhat loosely, putting it at risk of coming disconnected
Plastic construction of the stations feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: They were great UNTIL...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I really loved these intercoms. However, the power cords in two of them seemed kind of loose and would fall out if you slightly moved the intercom boxes. I didn’t worry about it and tried not to move them. A little over a month has passed and the power cord fell out again. I go to connect it and it absolutely will not go in the jack. Now I have only 3 instead of four intercoms. Like I mentioned, another one is also loose. So will that break shortly too? I can’t return them because the window of time is up. These were expensive to have broken so quickly. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Gets my childrens attention when I need them!!
customer_reviews.text: Being disabled this helps so much because I have put one upstairs so I can call my children down when I need them!! I love this system!
customer_reviews.author: Jesi Janney

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: The purchase of 4 intercom system is very practical. Two of them will be use at home . It is more convenient use it to call children upstairs and downstairs . Another two will be use in the restaurant. One at the cash register, and the other in the kitchen . It saves lots of time to walk in and talk. Also the sound very loud and clear. A little farther distance also use very well. This product is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Clear reception, works great
customer_reviews.text: Set-up is super easy (basically, you just plug both units into the wall and it's good to go). Use is also idiot-proof, press talk to talk. Signal is strong and clear, even in my house, which has issues with wireless products like baby monitors and wifi. It came right out of the box and didn't need to fiddle excessively with location in order to get it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great convenience! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We have put these all over the house and LOVE them! My husband and I were always searching, searching for each other all throughout our home to the point of ridiculous...upstairs, downstairs, my office, his office, my dressing room, laundry room, sunroom...our house is large and quite spread out. Now, we leave all of these on the same channel and with a touch of the button...instant communication! They are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Wireless intercom
customer_reviews.text: These are great to communicate with kids when you have a second story home. My 14 and 12 year old learned how to use these quickly. They are each assigned a number for their rooms so I can chose who to talk to or can use the group option to communicate with all. I have one in my bedroom, one in kitchen and one in each kids room (2) . After having 2 only I decided to add 2 more. I was able to connect all 4 easily.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia E. Jaimez

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews that complained about the quality of the build and the sound. The build is what you'd expect in today's world of plastic and not less or more than expected for the price. The sound quality was excellent considering we're not listening to music here. The installation consists of plugging the units into the wall sockets so a child of 3 could probably do it. I bought 2 units and I'm thinking about buying another one to put in a different room. Since I only use channel 1 right now, I'm not sure how using multiple channels will work out but I have no reason to think it won't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Al Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the disabled and elderly.
customer_reviews.text: I won two of these in a giveaway. We plugged them in and never used them. My daughter had a fall the other day and was able to get to her intercom to get help. They are worth every penny in an emergency. I bought two more to add around the house.
customer_reviews.author: HauntedForest

customer_reviews.title: A big change in our house
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over a month and still love it. This product has made life so much easier at home. We simply press the talk button and can have a conversation with someone in a different room, even a different floor. No more yelling, two even three times something. No more getting frustrated that they can't hear what I have said. The only issue we had in the beginning was finding the correct frequency channel to use in our house. After we got it correct, it was amazing After using this item for longer period of time, this exceeds my expectations. It makes my household more enjoyable each day!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Time Savers
customer_reviews.text: I have an art studio 150 feet from my house. These intercoms work great when wanting to touch base with the house. I don't answer the phone when painting but if there is an important call my wife will say who it is. The intecoms are clear sounding and easy to use. They also have a nice blue glow at night. The price was reasonable and installaiton was simple. I like them and they've saved my wife and I a lot of walking back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Our family is extremely impressed with this four set system. We have a two story house. We put one unit in the upstairs master bedroom, one in my husband's upstairs office, one downstairs in the kitchen and one in the downstairs mother-in-law suite. Each unit works great. The sound is clear as a bell with no interference or static whatsoever. My 88 year old mother-in-law can easily use it as well; that is very important to us. We are so happy with this system. For the price, it cannot be beat. We highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarglider

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Don't waste your time or money with these people.  Wow...
customer_reviews.text: Monitor function does not work. This feature was vital to my choosing this product to help me with the care of my child. I tried to work out the issue with the seller, trusted them and ended up missing the return deadline! Purchase at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This intercom system is ok. It does what I want it to do and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: It has done all that I've asked for!
customer_reviews.text: It's used as an intercom between the basement and top story on our house. Always clear voices heard either way. I never had a problem setting it up, but was offered support if needed. This has saved countless steps and loud voices between wife & I. Sorry I didn't get this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Delhooters

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to function between buildings. Right out of the box, worked as advertised. Next to NO setup, just plug them in and speak.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up , just plug them in and pick a channel. Works well in our business for reaching the guys out back with a question.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Good Intercom System
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and operate. Units are small and sleek. We're using them between floors in our house and they work perfectly. Operate on UHF frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McCulloch, Author of Fracture Gradient

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great I bought 4 for the main level of my house and 4 for the lower level. Helps keep me from yelling up or down the stairs. Works well. We use it daily
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, good reception. Installed units on different floors of the house. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: zoblamouche

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the intercom system for a friend's business and it arrived on time for Xmas which is awesome because it was meant as a gift. The intercom works perfectly for it's intended use. It's for a brewery and there are two parts, tasting room and and brew area. The areas can talk to each other easier now. The perfect gift in my opinion. So far nothing negative from the brewer and staff! We will update review if anything occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen E. DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: a must have for large or multiple floor homes
customer_reviews.text: 2 in the bedroom, one in the kitchen, living room, 4 season porch, library/guest room, laundry room, one for back yard patio. saves from yelling and a ton of walking.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office to use, it’s a good device for myself and my colleague when we need to communicate while using computer to go over spreadsheet.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chou

customer_reviews.title: it works just fine
customer_reviews.text: i bought a total of six for the house. connect and press and hold for a few seconds the number you are assigning the unit. then to call i just press the number of who im calling, push talk and speak. person on the other end presses talk to reply. i really don't use any of the other features.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality on these things is terrible! They broke or quit working after a short time. I'm very disappointed with this purchase. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy setup, we placed one in the basement and one in the kitchen and it works as described. We ere little disappointed that we couldn't hear the washing machine or dryer when they were finished ( that's why we bought them) but they work.
customer_reviews.author: Buford A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to intercom between rooms. Easy to use. Good range. We had a unique situation and the company was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Arp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace a baby monitor as our toddler wants to be able to easily communicate back and forth. Was simple to set up and teach her to use. The volume can be set loud enough to wake us if she needs us.
customer_reviews.author: Naders13

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put one in the garage so I could call my husband when he had a phone call or I had a question
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fine Units
customer_reviews.text: Have these scattered across our home. They also integrate great with other devices on 462mhz with DSQ (digital squelch) programming. Caution - When plugin the power plug to the back of these units. Very small, fragile and tight. I think they are pinned for alignment. Just use caution not to much pressure til you think align. Other than that, the range is as specified. I got 2 miles with a mobile radio test on FRS. Be great for Neighbor Watch base operations with the RANGE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple to install and easy to use, what I didn't like was the fact that the voice it's kind of distorted, not real clear. I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Preferido

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. It would come on and pick up sound when idled. Like it was ghosting sound. I tried another channel but then the channel would switch back
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Junk
customer_reviews.text: One of the power cords is bad out of the box. Bad quality junk!
customer_reviews.author: photoman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up, Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We love its compact size and convenience of 4 different areas of use.
customer_reviews.author: debb052

customer_reviews.title: Great range
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. Sometimes you can hear other people but it might be because they have great range.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Parents needed an intercom.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one Dad selected. They have liked it. Have found it useful when needed. Be sure to adjust your volume buttons.
customer_reviews.author: E. Minnich

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in order to communicate with my husband while he is out working in the garage. Clear and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Franks

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: We love these. My husband has one in the garage and the other one is in the house. They work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Fornengo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We order it for office work and gave it a test try. Really like this product. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Ammuhaq

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wireless intercom system, I am a caregiver to my mother who lives with us, our bedrooms are on separate sides of our house so if she needs help in the middle of the night, it's a 1 button operation ! Super easy for her to use..I recommend this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Great for large two story homes, works from far garage to upstairs rooms. Just plug it in and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Thorner

customer_reviews.title: i  hightly recomend it
customer_reviews.text: i like that its clear and easy to use i use this do to having a 2 story house and i can communicate with my family down stairs thanks for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good range!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable multi channel intercom system. Works thru warehouse walls and is clear enough to hear each other over the com.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I have setup one in each bedroom including in my kitchen. Easier to use intercom rather than screaming off the top of my lungs for my children
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto call answering isn't as described
customer_reviews.text: The monitoring isn't simple at all. You can't listen when you decide to the monitor (you have to turn on the other monitor to hear it every x hours).
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Basically just plugged it in and used it within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: rtmckiny

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solution to implement an access control both in business or residence. I like specially the long distance I can connect the receiver, that helps a lot. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Simerly

customer_reviews.title: I'm receiving outside voices in the middle of night.
customer_reviews.text: All the hoop-la about being with you if any if any problems occur is not true
customer_reviews.author: Norman Filipiak

customer_reviews.title: Satisfy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install instruction Where easy to understands and the system has a very good range
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: These work really well
customer_reviews.text: Great way to wake the kids up in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Great way to communicate throughout our house
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to communicate throughout our house without yelling. These work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Thompson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Stop the yelling across the house
customer_reviews.text: I have always disliked having us or our kids yell across the house to communicate with each other, or down in the basement with the freezer and playroom. It was vey easy to set up and hang on the wall. The kids had fun playing with it and giving each other silly messages at first, but in the long run, it was perfect for our "long distance communication."
customer_reviews.author: TechMama

product_meta.title: QNIGLO Intercoms, Wireless Intercom System for Home, Long Range House Intercom System for Office, Two Way Wireless Intercom Systems for Business (2-Way-Intercoms)
feature_bullets: 【Excellent Signal】Home intercom system with clear sound quality and long range. An enhanced signal helps ensure crisp sound quality. Ideal wireless intercom system for home!
【10 Channels】10 channels and 3 digital codes in a secure wireless intercom system.

【Easy To Set Up and Use】No installation requirement, you can mount the unit on the wall, or place them on a table, operates whenever there is an existing 100-240V AC plug in your home or office, there is no fee, no wiring, do not need change the original structure, receiving reliable, working stable.
【Automatic answer mode】When called, the unit can answer automatically without ring. This excellent function help you to monitor the older or child at night, there won't bother them.
【Best Quality Assurance:】We provide a lifetime service for Wuloo home intercom system. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns about your purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
